output_list.description: mintToken function allows arbitrary increase of token supply, aka 'The Token Devalue' issue.
sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * sellPrice'.
buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * buyPrice'.
transfer function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_to] + _value'.
transferFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_to] + _value'.
